text:
#chloroquine is a medication that is taken to prevent malaria infection. A version of Chloroquine, known as #Hydroxychloroquine, has shown promise as a #COVID19 #CoronavirusPandemic treatment.  What do the studies show? Read this article to find out! 👇
https://t.co/7L0iDIobyB https://t.co/kK9bLWGDyq
